entry.title: 464: Jamstack & New Netlify Features with Jason Lengstorf & Phil Hawksworth
entry.summary: Jason Lengstorf and Phil Hawksworth chat about the current state of the Jamstack including React + Jamstack, Distributed Persistent Rendering, building for ease of use, dealing with minor changes and caching, whether Jamstack needs to do all things, and a big new Netlify features announced!
